article.title: Status and history for deu_1996
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: “des weiteren” corrected to “des Weiteren” and “zuteil werden” corrected to “zuteilwerden”. Deleted an inserted comma that is not obligatory, restored an acceptable comma and added a comma. Moved “gewährleistet” so that its position corresponds to the OHCHR translation in the PDF version. Thanks to Ivan Panchenko.

Two typos: “Forschritt” corrected to “Fortschritt” and “Staatsanghörigkeit” corrected to “Staatsangehörigkeit”, thanks to Roey Horns. Added two missing commas and removed and extra comma, thanks to Otto Stolz.
“einschließlich” requires the genitive. Thanks to Asmus Freytag.
Stage 4: initial version in provided by Otto Stolz.
